Params: {3: 'I do not wish to explain my life to others.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>I do not wish to explain my life to others.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3'}

{3: 'Towering bookshelves stretch up into the clouds, row upon row, while compact archives with rotating handles and massive iron cabinets crisscross this seemingly endless space in an intricate grid.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Hello there, thanks for using Tabula Akasha. I'm Huaxu, and I'm here to help you get your mind data uploaded."}

{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>All my life, I\'ve stumbled upon too many secrets that just can\'t be shared outside these walls, and I\'ve seen countless versions of "history" come and go.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3'}
{3: 'All my life, I\'ve stumbled upon too many secrets that just can\'t be shared outside these walls, and I\'ve seen countless versions of "history" come and go.'}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=40>I've seen the lies in history, like when the Yazi purged all of Kowloong under the cloak of night.</size>", 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: "I've seen the lies in history, like when the Yazi purged all of Kowloong under the cloak of night."}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=40>I've quelled conflicts throughout history, driving out blood relatives who scheme to snatch my power.</size>", 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: "I've quelled conflicts throughout history, driving out blood relatives who scheme to snatch my power."}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=40>I've laid the groundwork for historical progress, launching space fleets with Kowloong's backing.</size>", 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: "I've laid the groundwork for historical progress, launching space fleets with Kowloong's backing."}
{3: 'When all of this is set aside, when "Qu"\'s life story unfolds across the tapestry of history...'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>How will others pick apart my life?</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: 'How will others pick apart my life?'}
{3: 'Rows of bookshelves interlock and fold like mortise and tenon joints, fanning out into a boundless ocean that belongs to "Qu."'}
{3: "The library shifts like rippling shadows. From her moment in time, countless versions of Qu crisscross this sea of memory, weaving the life of Kowloong's ruler."}
{3: 'Every thread of her story is softly intertwined and faithfully recorded within Tabula Akasha.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>How am I supposed to explain my life to anyone?</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'How am I supposed to explain my life to anyone?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>Inside Tabula Akasha or outside it—it makes no difference.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: 'Inside Tabula Akasha or outside it—it makes no difference.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40><phonetic=The Emperor>The usurper</phonetic> is vile, defiling my lands.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: '<phonetic=The Emperor>The usurper</phonetic> is vile, defiling my lands.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40><phonetic=The Emperor>It</phonetic> broke into Tabula Akasha without permission, tampered with time, and twisted the meaning of "war."</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: '<phonetic=The Emperor>It</phonetic> broke into Tabula Akasha without permission, tampered with time, and twisted the meaning of "war."'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40><phonetic=The Emperor>It</phonetic> showed me endless visions of the past and future, trying to crush my will and steal my crown.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: '<phonetic=The Emperor>It</phonetic> showed me endless visions of the past and future, trying to crush my will and steal my crown.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>I am the only one who can serve as the "price" Kowloong must pay for its future.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: 'I am the only one who can serve as the "price" Kowloong must pay for its future.', 4: '1'}
{1: '"The final divergence point of the ideal confidence simulation... is your death."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '2', 10: '1'}

{1: '"This unit cannot confirm the accuracy of this simulation, but it is the only approximate solution derived under the influence of uncontrollable variables."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 8: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>Time slips by, <para\\>dew turns to frost. I've lost count of how many cycles I've been through in Tabula Akasha. But—", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'I stand among the graves of countless blades and guns.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'I will drive out the usurper and protect Kowloong and Tabula Akasha at all costs.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 7: '1'}
{1: "I will seize the threads of fate and hold fast to Kowloong's future.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 7: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>The mountains that shaped Kowloong. The sun that powers Tabula Akasha.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: 'The mountains that shaped Kowloong. The sun that powers Tabula Akasha.'}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=40>I won't explain my life to anyone—</size>", 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: "I won't explain my life to anyone—"}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=40>Only time and Kowloong itself have the right to judge me.</size>', 4: '-400', 9: '3', 11: '1'}
{3: 'Only time and Kowloong itself have the right to judge me.'}
{3: "But once Huaxu is reset, it would expose all of Tabula Akasha's data to the Punishing Virus."}
{3: "Even with Asimov, Villier, and Zavier rebuilding the code together, there's only a 50% chance of taking Huaxu back from Schulz."}
{3: "Babylonia's Task Force has landed with the domain node—"}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If you can't stop them, at least block them outside for now—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The troops that arrived later, they are already setting up domain nodes!', 4: '1'}
{2: '?', 3: 'Tell them to take those domain nodes and get out of this city.'}
{3: 'A weary figure appears outside the tent, carrying someone on her back, with the equally wounded Pulao by her side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll say it again, tell them to get out of this city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'If Babylonia decides to deploy the Longinus Arsenal against Kowloong, I will take down every single person in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The ruler of Kowloong returns to her throne.'}
